summary: Fixed 500 Internal Server Error for /login page. The issue was caused by an incomplete Next.js build - the build was missing static files. Restored the salon details page from backup (which had a syntax error from previous edits) and completed the Next.js build successfully. The login page should now work correctly.
current_status: Beauty Booking module testing in progress. Fixed 401 errors for public endpoints. Fixed 500 error for login page by completing Next.js build. Continue testing booking flow and other functionalities.
